item.title: EKC SILVER 34.1 RELEASED 7-17-19_________ 7-20-19 SCRUBS IS CURRENTLY THE BEST MEDIA ADDON. ON THIS SECOND VERSION OF 34 I ADDED UNDER EKC TV A SAVE DATA MENU. ANYTHING YOU SAVE TO THE WHITE LIST WILL NOT DELETE YOUR DATA. IT WILL SAVE YOUR EKC TV LOG IN FOR YOU. I ALSO SET EVERYTHING TO OPENMETA. SCRAPERS ARE CHANGING TOO FAST TO HAVE A STABLE DEFAULT. I WILL NOW POST IN THIS SUB MENU WHICH ADDON IS WORKING BEST AND YOU CAN SELECT IT WHEN YOU PICK YOUR MEDIA. FAVORITES IS NOW SET TO SUPER FAVORITES AND IF YOU SELECT SUPER FAVORITES IN THE SAVE DATA MENU IT WILL SAVE ALL YOUR MEDIA FOR YOU.
EKC TV IS ONLY $10 A MONTH
EKC TV IS LIVE AND WORKING AMAZINGLY. IF YOU WOULD LIKE A CABLE LIKE EXPERIENCE WITH EVERY CHANNEL, SPORTING PACKAGE, AND LOCAL NEWS, GO TO ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM NOW AND SIGN UP!.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
